description:
Nature Materials, Published online: 08 July 2024; doi:10.1038/s41563-024-01909-w

An oral inulin allergen gel restores the microbiota of allergic mice and suppresses undesired immune responses to achieve allergen-specific oral tolerance, effectively overcoming food allergy.
title: Inulin-gel-based oral immunotherapy remodels the small intestinal microbiome and suppresses food allergy
